ANU.name: Patricia Jalland
ANU.colleges: College of Arts and Social Sciences
expertise: Australian History Excl. Aboriginal And Torres Strait Islander History
interest: Social history of old age in Australia; social and cultural history of death, grief and mourning in Britain and Australia; history of women and the family in Britain and Australia.
